ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | modsubi.1 | |- N e. NN |
| 2 |  | modsubi.2 | |- A e. NN |
| 3 |  | modsubi.3 | |- B e. NN0 |
| 4 |  | modsubi.4 | |- M e. NN0 |
| 5 |  | modsubi.6 | |- ( A mod N ) = ( K mod N ) |
| 6 |  | modsubi.5 | |- ( M + B ) = K |
| 7 | 2 | #P_nnrei | |- A e. RR |
| 8 | 4, 3 | #P_nn0addcli | |- ( M + B ) e. NN0 |
| 9 | 8 | #P_nn0rei | |- ( M + B ) e. RR |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqeltrri | |- K e. RR |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( A e. RR /\ K e. RR ) |
| 12 | 3 | #P_nn0rei | |- B e. RR |
| 13 | 12 | #P_renegcli | |- -u B e. RR |
| 14 |  | #P_nnrp | |- ( N e. NN -> N e. RR+ ) |
| 15 | 1, 14 | #P_ax-mp | |- N e. RR+ |
| 16 | 13, 15 | #P_pm3.2i | |- ( -u B e. RR /\ N e. RR+ ) |
| 17 |  | #P_modadd1 | |- ( ( ( A e. RR /\ K e. RR ) /\ ( -u B e. RR /\ N e. RR+ ) /\ ( A mod N ) = ( K mod N ) ) -> ( ( A + -u B ) mod N ) = ( ( K + -u B ) mod N ) ) |
| 18 | 11, 16, 5, 17 | #P_mp3an | |- ( ( A + -u B ) mod N ) = ( ( K + -u B ) mod N ) |
| 19 | 2 | #P_nncni | |- A e. CC |
| 20 | 3 | #P_nn0cni | |- B e. CC |
| 21 | 19, 20 | #P_negsubi | |- ( A + -u B ) = ( A - B ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( A + -u B ) mod N ) = ( ( A - B ) mod N ) |
| 23 | 10 | #P_recni | |- K e. CC |
| 24 | 23, 20 | #P_negsubi | |- ( K + -u B ) = ( K - B ) |
| 25 | 4 | #P_nn0cni | |- M e. CC |
| 26 | 23, 20, 25 | #P_subadd2i | |- ( ( K - B ) = M <-> ( M + B ) = K ) |
| 27 | 6, 26 | #P_mpbir | |- ( K - B ) = M |
| 28 | 24, 27 | #P_eqtri | |- ( K + -u B ) = M |
| 29 | 28 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( ( K + -u B ) mod N ) = ( M mod N ) |
| 30 | 18, 22, 29 | #P_3eqtr3i | |- ( ( A - B ) mod N ) = ( M mod N ) |
